SEARCH
Module booking.core
Package booking.core

Class Room

java.lang.Object
booking.core.Room
public final class Room extends Object
A room that can be booked by a User with a Booking. Has four defining characteristics:
  • Room number
  • Room capacity
  • Price per night
  • List of bookings

    • Room

      public Room(int roomNumber, int roomCapacity, int pricePerNight, LocalDate bookedFrom, LocalDate bookedTo, User bookedBy)
      Create a new room with an initial booking.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - The room's number.
      roomCapacity - The room's capacity.
      pricePerNight - How much it costs per night to book the room.
      bookedFrom - When the booking starts.
      bookedTo - When the booking ends.
      bookedBy - Who the booking is for.
